page.title: 08Ironcrafts Centre,Stotfold
page.content: There is an Ironcraft centre in Stotfold it makes iron into many different things.John Day started this business and his son soon became interested.They have been going for 36 years. Mr. Twigg has been working there for 26 years.He is a very skilled blacksmith.He wanted to be a blacksmith from the age of 4.We met someone called Stephen.He was making a spiral so that he could finish off a gate.Then we went to see Mr. Twigg.He showed us lots of things and let us have some tools,like a fuller and a swage these are only some of them.Then we asked Mr. Day some questions.He led us into the show room.In there he talked to us about the things they make.They make gates,weather vanes, lamp holders,fire escapes and fireplace furniture.
